description: Triangle T(n,k) = number of labeled acyclic digraphs with n nodes, containing exactly k points of in-degree zero (n >= 1, 1<=k<=n).
references: F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, Academic Press, NY, 1973, p. 19, (1.6.4).
R. W. Robinson, Counting labeled acyclic digraphs, pp. 239-273 of F. Harary, editor, New Directions in the Theory of Graphs. Academic Press, NY, 1973.
formula: Harary and Prins (following Robinson) give a recurrence
crossrefs: Columns give A058877, A003025, A003026. Row sums give A003024.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 07 2001
